name: Garden Dodge
description:
Made in 72 hours for the Scorespace Game Jam #13

How to Play Movement  Hold LMB to aim in a direction and magnitude. Release LMB to jump. Stay on the flowers. Enemies

Avoid hitting raindrops and beetles. Jumping on top of beetles will send you over the next flower.

How To Win

The aim of the game is to survive as long as possible. The higher your time, the higher you get on the leaderboard.
